0.2.name: wordpress/latest-youare-updates
0.2.description:
Show your latest YouAre updates on your WordPress blog

Features:

  • Displays your latest YouAre update(s), and when it was last updated
  • Number of updates
  • Clickable hashtags
  • Translations via wp-config (English, Spanish, Catalan)
  • Caches your tweets to improve page load times
  • Section Title
  • Customize XHTML
